subject: RE: [junit] Re: Test Grouping/Partitioning
msgSnippet: ... I just ran all the database tests this morning, and I didn t think anything was unusual about it at all. Todd.
messageBody:
> I have yet to be on a project where /anyone/ /ever/ wanted to
> run "all the database tests". All the /slow/ tests, sure. All
> the tests that fail intermittently due to configuration
> problems, absolutely.

I just ran "all the database tests" this morning, and I
didn't think anything was unusual about it at all.


Todd.
